requirements.description: Publisher will publish the App on the applicable app store and be solely responsible for compliance with the App Store Terms
App Store Terms include requirements for obtaining user consent, disclosing data collection practices, and providing opt-out options
StartApp does not represent or warrant that use of the Service will comply with the App Store Terms
StartApp shall have no liability for any costs or damages incurred to the Publisher as a result of noncompliance with the App Store Terms
Using the Service may require additional permissions from End Users that the App may not originally require

type.summary: Potential Need for Additional User Permissions
